This map provides insight on measles cases in 2019 in the US and correlates them with Non-medical exemption (NME) hotspots. NME's in this case are exemptions to vaccines based on personal or religious beliefs. Counties in Texas have long battles measles outbreaks, as even now in early 2025 an outbreak of more than 130 has it the state with one confirmed death (McKay, 2025).
![Measles Map](https://avalere.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/measels_map.png)

Sources:

McKay, R. (2025, February 27). *First U.S measles death reported in West Texas; outbreak affects more than 130 people*. Reuters. https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/first-us-measles-death-reported-west-texas-outbreak-affects-more-than-130-people-2025-02-26/
